name: OB_DEL_EPISIO_RSN
description: This table contains the category values which correspond to indications for episiotomy. This data comes from the Delivery Summary activity.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPISIOTOMY_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category values which correspond to indications for episiotomy. This data comes from the Delivery Summary activity.
